SmartSandwich: This innovative sandwich toaster uses AI to detect the type of bread and filling placed inside, and adjusts the toasting time and temperature accordingly. It can also suggest healthier toasting options based on the user's dietary preferences.

ToastMate: This smart sandwich toaster features a built-in assistant that can help users create their perfect toast. Users can simply say "Hey ToastMate, I'm in the mood for a grilled cheese" and the toaster will automatically set the temperature, timing, and even suggest the perfect cheese and bread combination.

ToastGenie: This magical sandwich toaster grants users their toasting wishes. Simply say "ToastGenie, I want a grilled cheese with extra cheese and tomato" and the toaster will create the perfect sandwich. The toaster also includes a fun and playful interface, complete with a genie-themed design.

BreadBot: This smart sandwich toaster is equipped with a built-in bread slicer, making it easy to prepare the perfect slice of bread for toasting. The toaster also includes a built-in cheese grater and spreader, allowing users to add their favorite toppings with ease.

ToastTeller: This advanced sandwich toaster uses advanced sensors and algorithms to detect the level of toasting desired by the user. Simply place the bread and filling inside, and the toaster will automatically determine the perfect level of toasting based on the user's preference. The toaster also includes a built-in timer and alert system, ensuring that the toast is ready when the user is.
